```{r setup}
library(bacontrees)
```

```{r}
set.seed(8)
d <- lapply(1:3, function(x) rvlmc(1000, 0:2, 
                                   c("*.0", "*.1.0", "*.1.1", "*.1.2", "*.2"),
                                   list(c(0.1,0.2,0.7),
                                        c(0.3, 0.3, 0.4),
                                        c(0.8, 0.1, 0.1),
                                        c(0.2, 0.5, 0.3),
                                        c(0.1, 0.1, 0.8))))
```

```{r}
bt <- baConTree$new(d, maximalDepth = 3)
bt$getActiveNodes()
bt$setAlpha(0.01)
bt$setContextPriorWeights(function(node) -1/3*node$getDepth())
```

```{r}
#bt$nodes[[3]]$extra
bt$activateMaximal()
bt$getActiveNodes()
```
